Call for

Proposals

Deadline is January 11, 2016

Kafka Summit 2016: Real-Time data stream processing Massive Scale

The Kafka Summit is the first event of it's kind that will bring together the best minds in the Apache Kafka Community. The summit takes place April 26, 2016 at the San Francisco Hyatt. Attendees will hear from leading users across a wide array of industries. Considering attending if you or your organization is really interested in massively scalable systems.

If you have questions or would like information on sponsoring the Kafka Summit, please contact organizers@kafka-summit.org

Registration is now open
